exp2 init


get gps data at each point. 

heading info: get 171~180 direction vector of both vins and gps
            -> get heading offset of two frames
            -> apply it to vins heading to get gps heading

110s init

vins has data:

(0, 0.00019100995840280722, 0.00015999313526430267, -0.00019343218885974823)

apply offset, and we will get global vins init pose
